CodeList.Name: Device Events Category

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist based on the category of related records for the device event.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Issue associated with the failure of the device to perform a self-calibration procedure or process designed to assure the accuracy and proper performance of the device. (FDA)
Issue associated with written programs, codes, and/or software system that affects device performance or communication with another device. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Computer Software Problem Associated with Medical Device

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Issue associated with the failure of the software to store collected data.

Issue associated with any deviations from specifications relating to device operations (e.g. deployment, connection, electrical, computer software, infusion/flow, output, protective-measure, and incompatibility issues).
Issue associated with any deviations from specifications relating to non-study device or equipment operations.
An inspection and/or surveillance activity that has been anticipated to occur and was assigned a time or date when that activity is to be performed. (NCI)
All program coding after initial deployment to correct coding errors, enhance the functionality of the software, and perfect the functioning of the software. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Device Events Category Terminology
